output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, "CMF: 11240017" is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral propaganda.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, specifically mentions "Marcel Ciolacu", who is a presidential candidate (Poziția nr. 3).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram with an estimated reach of 45,000-50,000 impressions and targeting a potential audience of 100,001-500,000 people.
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clearly promotes Marcel Ciolacu and PSD as the "complete team" for leading the country, using the campaign slogan "#CaleaSiguraPentruRomania".
5. Journalism: No, this is not journalistic content but rather a promotional message from a PSD representative.
6. Personal opinion: While presented as a personal perspective from a director, it's clearly structured as campaign messaging with official party elements (CMF number, hashtags, campaign slogans).
This post continues electoral propaganda for the presidential elections after the conclusion of the campaign period, which is a direct violation of Article 55 t).

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Uses campaign slogans and hashtags - Is a paid advertisement reaching a large audience - Has clear electoral messaging promoting leadership capabilities
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Dolj, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea campaniei electorale, prin promovarea unui mesaj electoral plătit (ID Facebook: 1247733936473803) care îl susține explicit pe candidatul prezidențial Marcel Ciolacu. Postarea, activă după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, conține număr oficial CMF (11240017), folosește sloganuri de campanie (#CaleaSiguraPentruRomania) și promovează explicit candidatul în contextul alegerilor prezidențiale. Impactul estimat al postării este între 45.000 și 50.000 de afișări, demonstrând intenția clară de a influența electoratul după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.
